name: SSF1
title: Site-Specific Factor 1
subtitle: Invasion Beyond Capsule
notes:
**Note 1:**  Information about invasion beyond the capsule is collected in T as an element in anatomic staging.  It is also collected in this field as it may have an independent effect on prognosis.

**Note 2:**  Record the location of invasion beyond capsule as documented in the pathology report. 
* Assign code 000 if surgical resection of the primary site is performed, the pathology report is available for review, and invasion beyond capsule is not mentioned
rows: Invasion beyond capsule not present/not identified

Medial invasion:    
   Renal sinus      
   Perisinus fat

020 + 010
 
Medial invasion plus lateral invasion 
Renal sinus/perisinus fat invasion plus perinephric fat invasion
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
No surgical resection of primary site

Unknown or no information 
Not documented in patient record
